title: One reason why the AD curve is downward sloping

content.question: One reason the aggregate demand curve is downward-sloping is that as the price level increases,

choices.label: the purchasing power of assets decreases
the demand for the domestic currency on the foreign exchange market increases
the public feels richer and spends more

content.answer: the purchasing power of assets decreases
